channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Next shoe in Netflix-WBD saga drops as Paramount launches hostile bid that includes Trump son-in-law Jared Kushner
item.description: Over the weekend, President Trump voiced concern over the combined market share of Netflix and Warner Bros.

item.title: App That Tracks ICE Raids Sues U.S., Saying Officials Pressured Apple to Remove It
item.description: The developer of ICEBlock, which notifies users of ICE agent sightings, said Attorney General Pam Bondi censored his free speech.

item.title: Stocks: Everything is on hold until the Fed delivers that rate cut on Wednesday
item.description: The market will get moving again once it digests Chair Powell’s statement and his remarks to the press.

item.title: Todd Combs, a Buffett Protégé at Berkshire, Jumps to JPMorgan
item.description: The departure of the senior stock picker was one of several leadership changes ahead of Mr. Buffett’s planned departure as chief executive of Berkshir...

item.title: ‘It absolutely matters politically’: Swing-district Republicans alarmed at spiking health insurance premiums tipping midterms
item.description: Thirteen Republicans signed an October letter to the House speaker, saying that letting the tax credits lapse "would risk real harm to those we repres...

item.title: China makes history with $1 trillion trade surplus for first time ever
item.description: China’s exports rebounded in November after an unexpected contraction the previous month, according to data released Monday.

item.title: New Orleans Restaurants Feel Squeezed as Border Patrol Sweeps In
item.description: Ripple effects from a federal crackdown illustrate how heavily the city’s robust dining scene depends both directly and indirectly on immigrant worker...

item.title: Mike Bloomberg’s new $50 million mayor bootcamp trains local leaders not to ‘play it safe’
item.description: The initiative brings together 30 mayors and 60 senior officials from 17 countries.

item.title: Thai Jets Bomb Cambodia as at Least 5 Die in New Wave of Fighting
item.description: Each side accused the other of firing first. The hostilities came weeks after President Trump had cast himself as a peacemaker in the decades-old bord...

item.title: Golden Globe Nominations Confirm the Allure of Warner Bros.
item.description: The studio’s film “One Battle After Another,” and an HBO show it owns, “The White Lotus,” scored the most nominations for movies and television shows.

item.title: Maps: 7.6-Magnitude Earthquake Near Japan Prompts Tsunami Alert
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter, aftershocks and shake area.

item.title: Why Thailand and Cambodia Are Fighting
item.description: The latest violence comes months after President Trump helped mediate a cease-fire between the two nations.

item.title: Zelensky Met With European Leaders as Ukraine Peace Talks Drag On
